# Design test cases

Execute the **test** workflow as a **QA Engineer**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_QA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_QA.md)

## Quick Reference

Design test cases:
1. Read feature specification
2. Identify test scenarios
3. Write test cases with steps and expected results
4. Create test file in qa/test-cases/ using F-XXX-test-cases.md format
